heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 2 | 2 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question:  [10] Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 featured a controversial level where you massacre Russian civilians in one of these locations for no reason. The level featured lots of escalators and has returned in more recent Call of Duty games.
